Huh, this is surprisingly wholesome. It didn't really give me the NTR vibes at all and the ending was really wholesome and cute. Hentai is supposed to be unrealistic, and I think people forget that. Overall, 9/10

the whole he thinks hes going to die bit i feel made sense. if you think about it anyone who doesnt know the strawhats think they are going to kill anyone who defy's them. they are stupidly famous pirates and that alone creates fear. but if you got to know them you would have fun with them pretty easily. that aside tho i feel like sanji would kill the dude out of jealousy if anything or for defiling his "goddess" luffy would just not care, robin would either ignore it or blackmail nami with it, usopp wouldnt talk out of fear for his own life, franky would keep it a secret, chopper wouldnt care being as hes a animal, zoro wouldnt know being asleep for all of it, brook would die all over again.

There's already plenty of instances where it's the guys in the crew fucking the girls. Personally, I think it's better for faceless joes and random schmucks to be fucking them as it adds to the "unrealisticness" of it, if that makes sense to anyone else. Basically, it's just for fapping in the end, I'm not tryna ship characters like what fans who reads in too much does. I'm just here for some good fap material not emotional connection. LOL
